Description: Change in Equity: The central bank's profit/loss for the period. Immediately added to E_CB.
Policy Rate History: A temporary vector holding the historical time series of the policy rate (r_bar_series) used as input for the adaptive learning algorithm.
External GDP History: A temporary vector holding the historical time series of Euro Area GDP (Y_EA_series) used as input for the adaptive learning algorithm.
External Inflation History: A temporary vector holding the historical time series of Euro Area Inflation (pi_EA_series) used as input for the adaptive learning algorithm.
